line.text: Say that thou didst forsake me for some fault
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And I will comment upon that offence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Speak of my lameness and I straight will halt
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against thy reasons making no defence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou canst not (love) disgrace me half so ill
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To set a form upon desired change
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As Ill my self disgrace knowing thy will
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I will acquaintance strangle and look strange
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Be absent from thy walks and in my tongue
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy sweet beloved name no more shall dwell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Lest I (too much profane) should do it wronk
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And haply of our old acquaintance tell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For thee against my self Ill vow debate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For I must neer love him whom thou dost hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
